problems.title: Max Consecutive Ones Ii (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given a binary array nums, return the maximum number of consecutive 1's in the array if you can flip at most one 0.

Input Format:
First line: integer n.
Second line: n space-separated integers (0 or 1).

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum number of consecutive 1's.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
